CustomField.formula: IF( Total_Risk_Score__c < 150 , 'Very Low', IF( AND(Total_Risk_Score__c >= 150, Total_Risk_Score__c < 224) , 'Low', IF( AND(Total_Risk_Score__c >= 224, Total_Risk_Score__c < 324), 'Medium', IF( AND(Total_Risk_Score__c >= 324, Total_Risk_Score__c < 449), 'High', IF( Total_Risk_Score__c >= 449, 'Very HIgh','')))))
CustomField.label: Risk Level
